Replace.Text: 可创建新城市。新城市的初始人口和单元格数量会随着时代的进步而增加。[NEWLINE]完成时，该城市 [ICON_Citizen] 人口减1。
May create new cities. Initial population and tiles of a new city will increase with the progression of game era.[NEWLINE]Reduces city's [ICON_Citizen] Population by 1 when completed.
可以无视地形提供6格视野的支援单位。可显示视野范围内的隐身单位。
Support unit that can provide a huge range (6 tiles) of sight regardless of terrain. Can reveal stealth units in its field of view.
可以无视地形提供8格视野的支援单位。可显示视野范围内的隐身单位。
Support unit that can provide a huge range (8 tiles) of sight regardless of terrain. Can reveal stealth units in its field of view.
